column5: Does anybody have a good place to buy Leech's in Sioux Lookout. We will need to pick some up in two weeks and any suggestions would be greatly appreciated. Thanks, Arnie
You might try Bernier's Baits about 10 minutes before you get to Sioux, or most of the bait shops in town - Ojibway baits, Al's Sports, DJ's gas bar - start there.
Any idea on prices at these places ? Thanks
Is Berniers on the right or left as you go towards Sioux Lookout ? Leechs price per pound ? Canadian money ? Thanks
We've always found decent leeches at Lac Seul Outposts. 800-567-4775 in Sioux Lookout. Good Luck.
